1145080.name: ODA Soundtrack
1145080.description:
All original music tracks written for ODA.
Composed and recorded by A Model Kit. A Model Kit is the solo musical project of Moscow native composer and sound designer Maxim Popov.

Track listing:

  • 1. Someone else - 3:12
  • 2. Memorial - 8:42
  • 3. This never happened before - 5:53
  • 4. Count to Ten - 3:35
  • 5. Losses - 3:31
  • 6. Art of Self-devotion - 3:41
  • 7. Distant Shores - 5:42

You can find all these tracks as .mp3 files in your steam game directory in folder "A Model Kit - ODA (mp3)".
1145080.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
